content.html: Redditor spends years talking about peanut butter being spicy, and sometimes it would be hard to breathe, and none of the people looking at him funny told him it's not normal. If you guessed that said redditor has an anaphylactic allergy, you'd be right. reddit.com/r/tifu/comment…
content.value:
Redditor spends years talking about peanut butter being spicy, and sometimes it would be hard to breathe, and none of the people looking at him funny told him it's not normal. If you guessed that said redditor has an anaphylactic allergy, you'd be right.
